abstract: The Federal Communications Commission voted on Tuesday to approve a Verizon Wireless plan to buy Alltel for $28.1 billion. After their deal, Verizon Wireless will overtake AT&T as the biggest U.S. mobile service.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Communications Commission voted on Tuesday to approve a Verizon Wireless plan to buy Alltel for $28.1 billion. After their deal, Verizon Wireless will overtake AT&T as the biggest U.S. mobile service.

headline.main: F.C.C. Approves Verizon’s $28.1 Billion Alltel Deal

abstract: California didn’t show T. Boone Pickens the love Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: California didn’t show T. Boone Pickens the love Tuesday.

headline.main: Pickens-Backed Bill Is Shot Down in California
